# HEIC Converter

## Summary
HEIC Converter is a free, secure, client-side tool designed to convert iPhone HEIC/HEIF images to high-quality JPG format instantly within the web browser.
It requires no software installation or user account, and ensures complete privacy by processing all files locally on the user's device without server uploads.
Developed by the VeryGood Design Team (VeryGood Chocolate), it offers unlimited fast conversions with original quality retention.

## Key Links
- Main Tool: https://heictojpg-6ic.pages.dev/
- About Team: https://heictojpg-6ic.pages.dev/about.html
- Privacy Policy: https://heictojpg-6ic.pages.dev/privacy.html
- Terms of Service: https://heictojpg-6ic.pages.dev/terms.html
- Contact: verygoodchocolate@gmail.com
